title: Collective Trauma
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Collective Trauma.

hook.text: When an entire community suffers together, the wound becomes shared.

buildup.text: Wars, genocides, pandemics, and natural disasters traumatize whole populations.

discovery.text: Collective trauma shapes cultural identity, politics, and social norms for decades.

climax.text: Recovery requires not just individual therapy but rebuilding social trust.

punchline.text: A nation's trauma lives in its stories, laws, and fears.

quiz.question: How does collective trauma differ from individual trauma?
options: It affects entire communities and shapes culture
